REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1864 reute h f BC-CLINICAL-DATA-<CLDA> 03-26 0050

TEXT.TITLE: CLINICAL DATA <CLDA> AWARDED RESEARCH CONTRACTS
TEXT.BODY: Clinical Data Inc said it has contracts with four major pharmaceutical firms to analyze certain data in research studies evaluating the efficacy and safety of new cardiovascular drugs. It said the contracts exceed 500,000 dlrs. Reuter
